td6.view

Class Fruit

  • java.lang.Object
    • td6.view.Figure
      • td6.view.SimpleFigure
        • td6.view.Circle
          • td6.view.Fruit

  • public class Fruit
extends Circle
    A fruit
    Invariants :
    getWidth() >= 0 && getHeight() >= 0, getHeight() == getSize() && getWidth() == getSize()

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fruit(int x, int y, java.awt.Color color)
      Create a new fruit in a center of a square of lenght "size", with coordinates multiplied by "size".

    • Constructor Detail

      • Fruit

        public Fruit(int x,
             int y,
             java.awt.Color color)
        Create a new fruit in a center of a square of lenght "size", with coordinates multiplied by "size".
        Parameters:
        x - the top x*size coordinate of the square containing the fruit
        y - the top y*size coordinate of the square containing the fruit
        color - the color of the fruit
        Preconditions :
        color != null && x >= 0 && y >= 0
